The Trello Timer Power-Up is a fantastic way to get started with time tracking in Trello. It's easy to set up and use, and it's a great way to track time spent on tasks without leaving Trello. Here's a step-by-step guide to help you get started:

**Enabling the Trello Timer Power-Up:**

1. Open your Trello board and click on the "Power-Ups" button in the top-right corner.
2. Search for "Trello Timer" in the Power-Ups directory.
3. Click on the "Enable" button to add the Power-Up to your board.

**Setting up the Trello Timer:**

1. Once enabled, you'll see a clock icon on each card in your board.
2. Click on the clock icon to open the timer popup.
3. Set the timer to start by clicking the "Start" button.
4. You can also add a description or comment to the timer to provide context about the task you're working on.

**Using the Trello Timer:**

1. When you're ready to start working on a task, click the "Start" button to begin the timer.
2. The timer will start counting up, and you can see the elapsed time on the card.
3. When you take a break or switch tasks, click the "Pause" button to pause the timer.
4. To resume the timer, click the "Start" button again.
5. When you've completed the task, click the "Stop" button to stop the timer.

**Viewing Time Logs:**

1. To view the time logs for a card, click on the clock icon and then click on the "Time Log" tab.
2. You'll see a list of all the time entries for that card, including the start and end times, duration, and any comments or descriptions you added.
3. You can also view the total time spent on the task by looking at the "Total Time" field on the card.

**Tips and Tricks:**

* You can use the Trello Timer on multiple cards simultaneously, which is helpful if you're working on multiple tasks at the same time.
* You can also use the Trello Timer on mobile devices, making it easy to track time on-the-go.
* If you need to edit a time entry, you can do so by clicking on the three dots next to the time entry and selecting "Edit."
* You can also export your time logs to a CSV file for further analysis or reporting.

That's it! The Trello Timer Power-Up is a simple yet effective way to track time spent on tasks in Trello. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
